task_description: Facing the building to your South-West (approx. 220°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will start by looking up to see the roof.
I have looked up and can now see the top of the building, so I will now look down to see the base to get a full view for my height estimation.

I have now viewed the top and bottom of the building; it appears to be about 7 stories high, and assuming a standard height of 3.5 meters per story, I estimate the total height to be approximately 24.5 meters.
